metadata.ground_truth: Alexander Bed and Brrakfast is located outside of town, whereas El Shaddai is in a centeral location and within walking distance of a lot of things.
metadata.predicted: The El Shaddai is in a good part of town, but the Alexander Bed and Breakfast is not in a good location according to some.

conversation.content: I really would like to try a japanese restaurant while in Cambridge.
Wagamama is a Japanese restaurant on 36 Saint Andres Street. Would you like me to make a reservation for you?
I'd like to treat myself.  Is this in the expensive range?
It is expensive. Shall I book it for you?
Yes, if this restaurant is in the Centre. I also need the postcode and phone number please.
Of course. The phone is 01223462354 and the post code is cb23ar. Can I do anything else for you?
I also need a hotel in the cheap price range.
I have located 2 hotel options, Alexander Bed and Breakfast and El Shaddai, both have internet and parking available. Would you like me to book one of these for you?
Are these located in a good part of town?
The El Shaddai is in a good part of town, but the Alexander Bed and Breakfast is not in a good location according to some.

That won't work—“not in a good location according to some” isn’t precise enough. Like I said before, I need exact postcodes, distance to the centre, and safety/noise details. Give me real figures for Alexander Bed and Breakfast and El Shaddai (rates, cancellation terms, and how far from the centre). <END> bye
